title: Sound On: Surprise Jobs Report, RNC Censure, Sanctions
itunes:title: Sound On: Surprise Jobs Report, RNC Censure, Sanctions
description:
Bloomberg Washington Correspondent Joe Mathieu delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.


Guests: Gene Sperling, American Rescue Coordinator and Senior Advisor to President Biden, Congressman Seth Moulton of Massachusetts, Congressman Brian Steil of Wisconsin, and Bloomberg Politics Contributors Jeanne Sheehan Zaino and Rick Davis.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
